div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1579 Syria, 1951 Burial: c. 50 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 179 AR Ariarathes V: 163 dr. Ariarathes VI: 6 dr. Ariarathes VII: 6 dr. Ariarathes IX: 2 dr. (Series II) Ariobarzanes I: 1 dr. Ariobarzanes II: 1 dr. Disposition: dispersed Information on file in ANS
